TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过处理 事件，您可以处理由您的控件之外的代码引发的异常，例如，由外部数据源) (。Handling the event lets you handle exceptions thrown by code outside your control (for example, by an external data source). 使用 属性可确定发生异常时的状态 。Use the property to determine the state of the at the time of the exception. 使用 属性可检索异常数据。Use the property to retrieve the exception data. 如果希望通过其他事件处理程序来处理异常，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。If you want to handle the exception by additional event handlers, set the property to `true`. 和 属性通常指示发生了数据错误的单元格。The and properties normally indicate the cell in which the data error occurred. 但是，在外部数据源中出现错误时，数据源可能不提供发生错误的列。When the error occurs in an external data source, however, the data source may not provide the column in which the error occurred. 在这种情况下， 属性通常指示在发生错误时当前单元的列。In this case, the property typically indicates the column of the current cell at the time of the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何响应类提供的信息 。The following code example demonstrates how to respond to information provided by the class. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举的成员 可以使用按位运算符组合起来 `OR` ，以表示 发生数据错误时数据绑定的状态。Members of the enumeration may be combined using the bitwise `OR` operator to represent the state of a data-bound when a data error occurred. 例如，如果用户输入无效的单元格值 (例如在需要日期) 的单元格中输入名称，然后选择不同的单元格，则 将尝试提交无效的单元值。For example, if a user enters an invalid cell value (such as entering a name in a cell that requires a date) and then selects a different cell, the will try to commit the invalid cell value. 当提交失败时， 将引发一个 事件，其 属性的值为 和 。When the commit fails, the will raise a event whose property will have a value of and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调查错误上下文。The following code example demonstrates how to investigate the error context. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要通过多个异常处理异常 ，请通过将属性设置为来在处理程序的末尾再次 引发异常 `true` 。To handle the exception by more than one , throw the exception again at the end of a handler by setting the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检查 属性。The following code example demonstrates checking the property. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已处理由属性表示的异常，则将此属性设置为， `false` 并且你不希望将异常传播到 可能处理事件的另一个异常 。Set this property to `false` if the has dealt with the exception represented by the property, and you do not want to propagate the exception to another that may handle the event. 出于调试目的，传播异常并检查堆栈跟踪以获取有关错误上下文的信息，这可能很有用。For debugging purposes, it can be useful to propagate the exception and inspect the stack trace for information regarding the context of the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指示不应引发异常。The following code example demonstrates using the property to indicate that the exception should not be thrown. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic.
